email_content:
Hi MedTech Solutions Team,

I hope you are well. We understand that an update to the scheduling and management platform is planned for mid-April. Ahead of that release, we wanted to share a brief overview of the items that are most important to our clinical and administrative teams so we can ensure a smooth transition for both staff and patients.

1. Planned downtime & cut-over schedule
• Please confirm the exact maintenance window and expected duration of any service interruptions so we can plan around patient appointments.

2. Data security & HIPAA compliance
• Kindly provide details on the new security controls being introduced (encryption standards, access-logging improvements, penetration test results, etc.).
• We would also appreciate an updated Business Associate Agreement if the scope of data processing changes in the new release.

3. New feature set and training resources
• A concise feature list, release notes, and user-facing change log will help us prepare our documentation.
• Do you have quick-start videos or a train-the-trainer deck we can circulate internally? Our preference is to begin short staff sessions ~1 week before go-live.

4. Pre-production testing
• If a sandbox or staging tenant is available, we would like access no later than two weeks prior to launch to validate custom appointment types, user roles, and reporting workflows.

5. Post-deployment support
• Please share the best channel for critical support during the first 72 hours after the upgrade (direct line, Slack, etc.) and your escalation matrix.

6. Open items from our side
• We are prepared to supply anonymized sample data for your QA team if helpful.
• Our IT lead (Alex Johnson, alex.johnson@ourclinic.com, +1-555-0167) will be the primary technical contact.

If any of the above requires a deeper discussion, we would be happy to join a 30-minute call this week.

Thank you for your partnership, and we look forward to the enhanced capabilities in the forthcoming release.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Operations Manager
Our Clinic
